title: (x) "La Image Script" script - (similar to) Vivaldi {Tim D}
content:
Can you identify the font for the “LaImage” text in this logo or something close. Perferably close, I don’t like the logo nor the text, but I have to make it similar.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [LaImage Logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=LaImage%20Logo.jpg) | 14.46 KB |
author: elabdesigns

comments.content:
[http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=vivaldi](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125105658/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=vivaldi)

I think your sample might have been based on this  
Tim
